content:
convert srt to vtt: a technical guide

This page shows you how to convert SRT files to VTT format step by step. You'll learn what each format is, why you might need to switch, and how to do it using command line tools like FFMPEG, Python scripts, or HappyScribe's tools.

What are SRT and VTT subtitle formats?

SRT (SubRip Subtitle) is a plain text file with time codes in HH:MM:SS,MS format, used widely for video players and editors. VTT (WebVTT) adds a header and supports web features like positioning and styling, often used in HTML5 video.

Why you might need to convert srt to vtt?

Many web players and streaming platforms require VTT for captions. If your project started with SRT, converting to VTT ensures compatibility with modern video browsers and online players.

How to convert srt to vtt with FFMPEG?

FFMPEG makes quick format switches. Run:

  • ffmpeg -i subtitles.srt subtitles.vtt

This reads your SRT file and writes a valid VTT file. You can batch process multiple files by scripting a loop in your shell.

How to batch convert srt to vtt with Python?

With Python you can rename or reformat headers in bulk:

  • Install a library: pip install webvtt-py
  • Use a script:
    • import webvtt
    • for vtt in webvtt.from_srt('path/to/file.srt'):
    • vtt.save('path/to/output.vtt')

This runs a batch conversion with minimal code. Perfect for developers who want full control.

How to manually convert srt to vtt in HappyScribe subtitle editor?

Open your SRT file in our Subtitle editor, then choose "Export" and select VTT. You can tweak timing or text before export. It's free with your Automatic transcription or Human-made subtitles project.

How to automate srt to vtt with HappyScribe API?

Use our Caption generator endpoint to get VTT directly. Example with cURL:

  • curl -X POST https://api.happyscribe.com/v1/transcriptions -H Content-Type:application/json -d '{"file_url":"https://example.com/file.mp4","format":"vtt"}'

The response returns a VTT file ready for your pipeline.

What to do after conversion?

Review your VTT with the Subtitle editor, add styles with our Caption generator, or translate with Automatic transcription. HappyScribe makes it simple to polish your captions.

Ready to convert your subtitles?

Sign up for HappyScribe to try our free tools. Start with any SRT file and get a perfectly formatted VTT in seconds.

Common questions about converting SRT to VTT?

How do I convert SRT to VTT for free?

You can use FFMPEG or try our free online converter on HappyScribe without signing up.

Can I convert multiple SRT files at once?

Yes, use a shell script or the Python example to batch convert dozens of files in a single run.

Do I need to edit time codes after conversion?

FFMPEG and webvtt-py handle time format changes automatically, but you can fine-tune in the Subtitle editor if needed.

Is WebVTT supported in Adobe Premiere?

Premiere Pro supports VTT import. Export from HappyScribe and drag the VTT file into your timeline for captions.

Can I convert SRT to VTT on Mac?

Yes, FFMPEG and Python scripts work on macOS. Install FFMPEG with Homebrew or run the Python example in Terminal.

Subtitle Format Comparison: SRT vs VTT

Feature SRT 📄 VTT 🌐
File Extension .srt .vtt
MIME Type application/x-subrip text/vtt
Header No header WEBVTT at top
Timestamp Format HH:MM:SS,mmm (comma) ⏱️ HH:MM:SS.mmm (period) ⏱️
Styling & Meta Basic text only Colors, classes, notes 🔖
Positioning Fixed order; no settings Align, line, position settings 🎯
Browser Support Need JS player or plugin Native in HTML5 players ✔️
Common Uses Offline videos, desktop apps 📺 Web streaming, live captions 🌐
File Size Smaller; simple text Small extra header & tags
Code Sample

00:00:01,000 --> 00:00:03,000
Hello world!

Hi there!

👍 Pros & Cons

SRT 📄

  • Pros: very simple, tiny file size
  • Cons: no styling, not native in browsers

VTT 🌐

  • Pros: web-ready, styling & positioning
  • Cons: slightly larger file, needs header
Format Use This If...
SRT 📄 You're making video files for download or apps that need the simplest subtitle format.
VTT 🌐 You're adding captions to web pages or need control over style and placement.
